1 <?php

3 namespace Ubiquity\cache\parser;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\orm\parser\Reflexion;
6 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;
7 use Ubiquity\annotations\router\RouteAnnotation;
8 use Ubiquity\cache\ClassUtils;
9 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UArray;
10 
20 class ControllerParser extends ControllerParserPathTrait {
21  private $controllerClass;
22  private $mainRouteClass;
23  private $routesMethods = [ ];
24  private $rest = false;
25  private static $excludeds = [ "__construct","isValid","initialize","finalize","onInvalidControl","loadView","forward","redirectToRoute" ];
26 
27  public function parse($controllerClass) {
28  $automated = false;
29  $inherited = false;
30  $this->controllerClass = $controllerClass;
31  $restAnnotsClass = [ ];
32  $reflect = new \ReflectionClass ( $controllerClass );
33  if (! $reflect->isAbstract () && $reflect->isSubclassOf ( "Ubiquity\controllers\Controller" )) {
34  $instance = new $controllerClass ();
35  try {
36  $annotsClass = Reflexion::getAnnotationClass ( $controllerClass, "@route" );
37  $restAnnotsClass = Reflexion::getAnnotationClass ( $controllerClass, "@rest" );
38  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
39  // When controllerClass generates an exception
40  }
41  $this->rest = \sizeof ( $restAnnotsClass ) > 0;
42  if (isset($annotsClass) && \sizeof ( $annotsClass ) > 0) {
43  $this->mainRouteClass = $annotsClass [0];
44  $inherited = $this->mainRouteClass->inherited;
45  $automated = $this->mainRouteClass->automated;
46  }
47  $methods = Reflexion::getMethods ( $instance, \ReflectionMethod::IS_PUBLIC );
48  $this->parseMethods ( $methods, $controllerClass, $inherited, $automated );
49  }
50  }
51 
52  private function parseMethods($methods, $controllerClass, $inherited, $automated) {
53  foreach ( $methods as $method ) {
54  if ($method->getDeclaringClass ()->getName () === $controllerClass || $inherited) {
55  try {
56  $annots = Reflexion::getAnnotationsMethod ( $controllerClass, $method->name, [ "@route","@get","@post" ] );
57  if (sizeof ( $annots ) > 0) {
58  foreach ( $annots as $annot ) {
59  $this->parseAnnot ( $annot, $method );
60  }
61  $this->routesMethods [$method->name] = [ "annotations" => $annots,"method" => $method ];
62  } else {
63  if ($automated) {
64  if ($method->class !== 'Ubiquity\\controllers\\Controller' && \array_search ( $method->name, self::$excludeds ) === false && ! UString::startswith ( $method->name, "_" ))
65  $this->routesMethods [$method->name] = [ "annotations" => $this->generateRouteAnnotationFromMethod ( $method ),"method" => $method ];
66  }
67  }
68  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
69  // When controllerClass generates an exception
70  }
71  }
72  }
73  }
74 
75  private function parseAnnot(&$annot, $method) {
76  if (UString::isNull ( $annot->path )) {
77  $newAnnot = $this->generateRouteAnnotationFromMethod ( $method );
78  $annot->path = $newAnnot [0]->path;
79  } else {
80  $annot->path = $this->parseMethodPath ( $method, $annot->path );
81  }
82  }
83 
84  private function generateRouteAnnotationFromMethod(\ReflectionMethod $method) {
85  $annot = new RouteAnnotation ();
86  $annot->path = self::getPathFromMethod ( $method );
87  return [ $annot ];
88  }
89 
90  public function asArray() {
91  $result = [ ];
92  $prefix = "";
93  $httpMethods = false;
94  if ($this->mainRouteClass) {
95  if (isset ( $this->mainRouteClass->path ))
96  $prefix = $this->mainRouteClass->path;
97  if (isset ( $this->mainRouteClass->methods )) {
98  $httpMethods = $this->mainRouteClass->methods;
99  if ($httpMethods !== null) {
100  if (\is_string ( $httpMethods ))
101  $httpMethods = [ $httpMethods ];
102  }
103  }
104  }
105  foreach ( $this->routesMethods as $method => $arrayAnnotsMethod ) {
106  $routeAnnotations = $arrayAnnotsMethod ["annotations"];
107 
108  foreach ( $routeAnnotations as $routeAnnotation ) {
109  $params = [ "path" => $routeAnnotation->path,"methods" => $routeAnnotation->methods,"name" => $routeAnnotation->name,"cache" => $routeAnnotation->cache,"duration" => $routeAnnotation->duration,"requirements" => $routeAnnotation->requirements,"priority" => $routeAnnotation->priority ];
110  self::parseRouteArray ( $result, $this->controllerClass, $params, $arrayAnnotsMethod ["method"], $method, $prefix, $httpMethods );
111  }
112  }
113  uasort ( $result, function ($item1, $item2) {
114  return UArray::getRecursive ( $item2, "priority", 0 ) <=> UArray::getRecursive ( $item1, "priority", 0 );
115  } );
116  UArray::removeRecursive ( $result, "priority" );
117  return $result;
118  }
119 
120  public static function parseRouteArray(&$result, $controllerClass, $routeArray, \ReflectionMethod $method, $methodName, $prefix = "", $httpMethods = NULL) {
121  if (! isset ( $routeArray ["path"] )) {
122  $routeArray ["path"] = self::getPathFromMethod ( $method );
123  }
124  $pathParameters = self::addParamsPath ( $routeArray ["path"], $method, $routeArray ["requirements"] );
125  $name = $routeArray ["name"];
126  if (! isset ( $name )) {
127  $name = UString::cleanAttribute ( ClassUtils::getClassSimpleName ( $controllerClass ) . "_" . $methodName );
128  }
129  $cache = $routeArray ["cache"];
130  $duration = $routeArray ["duration"];
131  $path = $pathParameters ["path"];
132  $parameters = $pathParameters ["parameters"];
133  $priority = $routeArray ["priority"];
134  $path = self::cleanpath ( $prefix, $path );
135  if (isset ( $routeArray ["methods"] ) && \is_array ( $routeArray ["methods"] )) {
136  self::createRouteMethod ( $result, $controllerClass, $path, $routeArray ["methods"], $methodName, $parameters, $name, $cache, $duration, $priority );
137  } elseif (\is_array ( $httpMethods )) {
138  self::createRouteMethod ( $result, $controllerClass, $path, $httpMethods, $methodName, $parameters, $name, $cache, $duration, $priority );
139  } else {
140  $result [$path] = [ "controller" => $controllerClass,"action" => $methodName,"parameters" => $parameters,"name" => $name,"cache" => $cache,"duration" => $duration,"priority" => $priority ];
141  }
142  }
143 
144  private static function createRouteMethod(&$result, $controllerClass, $path, $httpMethods, $method, $parameters, $name, $cache, $duration, $priority) {
145  foreach ( $httpMethods as $httpMethod ) {
146  $result [$path] [$httpMethod] = [ "controller" => $controllerClass,"action" => $method,"parameters" => $parameters,"name" => $name,"cache" => $cache,"duration" => $duration,"priority" => $priority ];
147  }
148  }
149 
150  public function isRest() {
151  return $this->rest;
152  }
153 }
